name: Coleman Triton Series 2-Burner Propane Stove
description: An update on a campsite classic. Having 2-burners feels like the height of luxury when you've been used to single burner backpacking stove. So, go ahead, make pancakes and coffee at the same time, or simmer a sauce while your boiling pasta. With the Triton 2-burner stove, your camp kitchen just got a lot more menu options.2 independently adjustable burners let you flex your culinary muscle, or just boil more water.Wind Block™ panels keep gusts at bay.Fits a 30cm and a 25cm pan at the same time.Regulator provides consistent performance in adverse conditions.Latch locking lid keeps thing contained.Lasts up to 1 hour on a single 454g (1lb) canister.Rugged stainless steel construction.Integrated handle makes getting to your camp kitchen easy.Removeable grates and cooktop for quick clean up.
